caption: MCP Server Input
description: Defines a user-supplied input required for MCP server configuration or authentication.
name: mcp_server_input

input_id.caption: Input ID
input_id.description: Unique identifier for the input field (used for reference in environment variables or configuration).

type.caption: Input Type
type.description: Method by which the input is collected (e.g., promptString, pickString, pickBoolean).

description.caption: Input Description
description.description: Human-readable explanation of what this input is and how it will be used.

password.caption: Password
password.description: Indicates if the input should be obscured for privacy/security (true for sensitive data like tokens or passwords).
